label.description: Asset container for a field label.

accessibility.description: A screen-reader friendly description of the field.

additionalInfo.description: Can contain additionalInfo, which can be any asset legal for additionalInfo.

placeholder.description: Text used as a placeholder. Be aware that XD typically favors using a note section instead of using placeholder text.

resultText.description: Can contain resultText, which can be any asset legal for resultText.

help.description: A help icon for the field.

beacon.description: Additional beacon data that will be sent during any field beacon event. This should not contain any PII.
